resources.string: QR scanning requires Android 7.0 (API level 24) or above.

Create a shortcut for this token?
Shortcut created, long press app icon to see it.
Before performing any operation, keep in mind that the current NFT does not belong to the current active wallet, but to %1$s.
Transferring this token will remove the associated shortcut from the home screen.
